subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: The American yacht Puma Ocean Racing was leading the Volvo Ocean Race around the world as the eight yachts approached the Cape Verde Islands in the Atlantic, despite pressure from the Swedish favorite Ericsson 4. It was the seventh day of the race, which started in the Spanish Mediterranean port of Alicante. The boats are expected in Cape Town on Nov. 3 at the end of the first of the 10 legs of the race.
